nodes.text: Krel was a male Human cyborg who was working for the Migrant Merchants' Guild on the planet Coruscant during the year 3643 BBY. A scientist, Krel designed war droids for the criminal organization and claimed to have created cyborg sleeper agents from civilians that had been captured by the Guild. The Republic Special Forces Division unit known as Havoc Squad killed the cyborg under the orders of General Garza.
